result.created: Created new result with identifier {{ param }}

delete.question: Are you sure you want to delete the result with id {{ id }}?
delete.question2: Are you sure you want to delete this result? It cannot be undone!

error.hasComplaint: A result cannot be deleted if it has a complaint!

resultString.programmingCodeIssues: {{ relativeScore }}%, {{ buildAndTestMessage }}, {{ numberOfIssues }} issues, {{ points }} points
resultString.automaticAIFeedbackInProgress: AI Feedback request is being processed
resultString.automaticAIFeedbackSuccessfulTooltip: AI-based feedback can include mistakes. Consider checking important information.
resultString.automaticAIFeedbackFailedTooltip: AI Feedback Request failed due to an internal error. Please try again shortly or contact the Artemis administrators if the issue persists.
resultString.automaticAIFeedbackTimedOutTooltip: Time for generating AI Feedback has expired. Please try again shortly or contact Artemis administrators if the issue persists.

result.invalidScore: Score is required and should be a number between 0 and 100.
result.exerciseStillOpen: Exercise is still open for submissions!
result.studentOverride: The due date of this exercise has not been reached yet. The student might override this manual assessment by committing a new solution.
result.gradedTooltip: This result is part of your graded participation.
result.notGradedTooltip: This result is not part of your assessment.
result.practiceTooltip: This result is part of your practice participation and will not have an influence on your assessment.
result.preliminaryTooltip: Your result is not final yet, because more tests will be executed after the due date
result.preliminaryTooltipSemiAutomatic: Your result is not final yet, because more tests will be executed after the due date or a manual assessment will be done.
result.preliminaryTooltipAthena: This is a grading by the AI, the actual result may differ
result.codeIssuesTooltip: The automatic code analysis generated some warnings for your code.
result.onlyCompilationTested: Your code compiled successfully. There are currently no tests visible.

chart.tooltip: Your deductions are limited in order to soften the effect of repeating issues. Be aware that you might have to solve multiple code issues to increase your score.
chart.filterApplied: A filter is applied to your feedback.

result.linkedCommit: This result is linked to the following commit:

programmingFailedSubmission.tooltipOfflineIde: No result was found / could be generated in time for your most recent submission. Please check your code manually in your IDE, e.g. check that your code compiles locally and works correctly.
programmingFailedSubmission.tooltipOnlineIde: No result was found / could be generated in time for your most recent submission. Please check your code manually as far as possible.

result.notLatestSubmission: Note: This result and feedback is not based on the latest submission.
result.afterDueDateFeedbackHidden: Even after the due date not for all test cases a detailed feedback is shown. This could be the case if other students are still working on the exercise (e.g. to allow for the compensation of sick days). Those feedbacks will automatically become visible after {{date}}.
result.notExecutedTestsTooltip: The tests might only get executed after the due date or there was an issue during the execution of the tests.
